phrases: I called because there is something I would like to tell you.
kodoku ga hoho wo nurasu nurasu kedo
kodoku ga hoho wo nurasu nurasu kedo

But when the dawn emerges in silence
yoake no kehai ga shizuka ni michite
yoake no kehai ga shizuka ni michite
And carries me up into the skies
And carries me up into the skies
watashi wo sora e maneku yo
watashi wo sora e maneku yo

Hope awaits on the other side
I have been wandering, trying to find you
I have been wandering, trying to find you
mayoi nagara mo kimi wo sagasu tabi
mayoi nagara mo kimi wo sagasu tabi

We missed each other, but our hands touched
surechigau ishiki te ga fureta yo ne
surechigau ishiki te ga fureta yo ne

I will hold your hand tightly
The first step toward our dream
The first step toward our dream

We are drawn closer as we begin to accept each other

tagai wo uketomeru tabi ni hikareteku
We will not need to spend our days in sadness anymore
We will not need to spend our days in sadness anymore
Because we will have a great time together
Because we will have a great time together

tagai wo uketomete ikiru yorokobi ni
That I am sure the two of us will
That I am sure the two of us will
What matters is that I have finally found you
What matters is that I have finally found you
mayoi nagara mo kimi wo mitsuketa yo
mayoi nagara mo kimi wo mitsuketa yo
Things got pretty intense after you transformed.
But on the bright side, you did not hurt anyone.
I think the Calm has something to do with that.
Your injuries still have not completely healed.
You know, I was told that you would actually die if I attacked you during the Calm!
I was such a nervous wreck!
Do not go playing with it!
It should heal right up as soon as the Calm passes.
I am not against trying new things, but I need to know what they are first.
When I asked Mitsuki-senpai what to make, she said that you love rice omelettes.
I was down to the very last one!
It is to celebrate your recovery.
And you cannot just rummage through my fridge just because I am unconscious!
Or put a pig head in there!
You just focus on getting sleep, Senpai.
I will run to the store and make you another one.
Ever since you fell unconscious, Mirai has been taking care of you.
She never once left your side.
You still do not get it?
Mirai, he may be a lost because.
What are you trying to say?!
What exactly are you trying to say?!
You should just tell him, plain and simple.
Th-That is because it is summer now.
It is pretty cold today, is not it?
She said she was going on ahead.
It is summer vacation, all right.
But when I texted Mitsuki-senpai a minute ago, she said that she was at school.
Besides, I do not have the money to buy more bonsai stuff.
Oh, I got a text from Sakura.
So this is where you were!
I could have sworn I heard Akihito's voice.
There is no denying that sunglasses are not as effective as regular glasses,
but by placing a girl who rarely wears glasses or swimsuits into a situation
Akihito kicked the bucket about two weeks ago.
Looking back, you have got to feel sorry for the guy.
They say that the more beloved you are, the shorter your life is.
But Akihito did not fit into that saying at all!
He was hated, scorned, and treated like a nuisance...
all the way to his dying breath.
In that case, you would better make yourself scarce.
Letting you see me in a bikini for free is nothing less than degrading.
I never asked you to put on a swimsuit!
Learn from this experience and take a good, hard look at yourself.
I have had all I can take...
While you are at it, drag that pervert to the clubroom with you.
The snow is not letting up, is it?
The days keep getting shorter, do not they?
Well, the summer solstice was a while ago.
Want To read for a bit longer?
Hiromi and Mitsuki sure are taking their sweet time.
And here I am, finally back after slipping between life and death.
Do not you think that is exactly why they left?
I bet it feels awkward for them to face you!
See, I was thinking we could go out to eat or something.
Ah, I can cover for you if you are short on cash.
I mean, I do not know what really happened,
but I am sure I must have put you through a lot.
I wish you had asked me earlier.
This will probably be over once the sun goes down.
Senpai, why are you always so nice to me?
I feel like the two of us are alike in a few ways.
If I said that, Kuriyama-san, would you get
You got a problem with that?!
Your disgust is written all over on your face!
How would that make me happy?!
Well, Mitsuki-senpai told me that you get immense pleasure
from people stepping all over you.
I am having a hard time mastering her techniques, though.
You do not need to master that!
Please forget what Mitsuki told you!
It is a collection of people's warped hearts.
It is said that it will destroy the world.
And... it was a demon that resided inside of you.
I originally came to this town to defeat Beyond the Boundary.
But things did not go according to plan.
I could not bring myself to kill you.
I did not want to kill you.
I was told that if I used the power of my blood during the Calm,
I could force Beyond the Boundary to leave your body.
I desperately wanted to do that.
Who are you, the Kuriyama-san sitting here in front of me?
Senpai, you still have not regained consciousness.
This is all part of a dream.
A tiny bit of my blood is still inside of you, causing you have this dream.
But the dream is about to come to an end.
Senpai, you are going to actually wake up soon.
I thought I could do it since this is a dream.
It really is hard, is not it?
It is a pleasure to meet you.
She is the legitimate heir to the cursed blood and an Exterminator.
She is from the clan that is abhorred by most Exterminators?
She attacks by manipulating her own blood.
She is able to shape and harden her blood.
It is also a potent poison capable of destroying her opponent's internal organs.
Will that be enough to defeat it?
It is still too soon to say for certain.
However, I believe she stands a good chance.
Is not her target said to be immortal?
I believe it simply has tremendously fast regenerative capabilities.
That is what the local Exterminators call it.
Here is what it looks like.
Unlike those possessed by a demon,
this dangerous creature is the inconceivable mix of a half-human and a half-demon.
I found that its demon half is Beyond the Boundary.
When my younger brother tried to subdue it, the creature retaliated.
His wounds put him on the brink of death.
You are the only person I can turn to.
Does the Exterminator's Society know about any of this?
I will offer her my full support.
I am sorry you had to attend that stifling meeting with me back there.
With all the history behind this area, there are bound to be many customs.
I am making sure it is kept under close observation.
In the end, I am going to have to kill it, right?
If that is the case, I would like to hurry.
How am I supposed to know if I can do it?!
I was asking if you are mentally prepared for this.
I heard about what happened with Inami Yui.
After the way the Exterminators persecuted you,
I know I am asking for a lot.
You do not need to apologize to me.
The half-demon's name is Kanbara Akihito.
It is a second year high school student.
I-I was too much for you.
Do you think you could do something about this?
Is he really all that dangerous?
Why are you so hung up on me?
Then why do not you quit being an Exterminator?
If I could quit, I would have a long time ago!
But the cursed blood running through my veins is not normal!
Why did you have to say that?
So as we predicted, his immortality is preventing you from finishing him off through normal means?
You should watch him for a while.
Attacking at random will get you absolutely nowhere.
Just like when Hiromi faced him,
Beyond the Boundary is sure to overtake the body eventually, even if it is only temporary.
That is when you should strike.
I am saying this as a friendly warning.
You should distance yourself from Akihito-kun.
I am inviting you to come visit the Literary Club.
You have not joined any other clubs,
and there are not all that many Exterminators at our school.
Plus you just got here, so
I believe I already turned that offer down.
Please do not come with me.
Why did you follow me, anyway?
Because you are a bespectacled beauty!
I was only ever thinking about myself.
Senpai has friends who are there for him.
That is why I thought you were not anything like me.
But I did not know anything about you or your life.
I had no idea how much you had been suffering
or how hard life had been on you.
I believe I told you to distance yourself from Akihito-kun.
The Hollow Shadow's possession had clearly weakened Beyond the Boundary.
You wasted the perfect opportunity to defeat it.
If we allow Beyond the Boundary to roam free,
it will use its massive power to destroy the world.
When that happens, there will be no second chances.
I have been thinking about it ever since then.
And I realized that being indecisive will not get me anywhere.
I have no choice but to annihilate SenpaiBeyond the Boundary.
But I do not want to kill him!
I do not want to kill him.
First, I shall place Kanbara Akihito in a frozen barrier
The Calm will have also weakened Beyond the Boundary, which I will draw out.
I will then tell Kuriyama Mirai that if she takes advantage of the Calm,
there is a way to save Kanbara Akihito without killing him.
Considering Kuriyama Mirai's current mental state,
I am certain she will believe me.
However, the Exterminator's Society is bound to come in pursuit of Beyond the Boundary as well.
I swear that we will annihilate it before they do.
Is what you said in the text all true?
Seeing as it is a demon,
even Beyond the Boundary will be weakened during the Calm.
If you use your body along with all of your blood,
you should be able to remove Beyond the Boundary from the body
However, that means Beyond the Boundary will violate your entire body.
But Senpai will not have to die that way, right?
You have already made up your mind, have not you?
This is where you will find Akihito-kun.
He will awaken sooner or later.
If you truly wish to save Akihito-kun, you had better act quickly.
He wants you to kill him so that you may live.
I am absolutely sure that is what he would want.
Regardless, you are going to rescue Akihito-kun, are not you?
I know that Senpai is going to be angry with me.
When he hears about what I did, he will say that I did not understand anything.
Just like he did back then...
The snow is starting to pick up.
That must be Beyond the Boundary's core.
seijaku wo kirisaku you otozureta no wa
We met in an inevitable encounter
I see a reflection of regrets
Enveloped in sorrow, you have blossomed beautifully
dare ka no seimei ni tokeru hana
The flower that fuses into someone is life
nee kimi ni mo mieru darou
Hey, do you see it too?
Let us paint over all the mistakes we have made
nando demo ii sa kurikaeshiteiku start line
A new start line will always be there if we want to start over
kako to wa chigau asu wo
Let us make our future different from the past
futari dake no kibou egaku start line
Our small hope will paint a new start line
That is how I always am
I am glad I was born!
I am truly glad that I came to this town and met you!
